data.name: The Guild 3 Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: The atmospheric Soundtrack to The Guild 3 features 25 high quality tracks for a total of nearly 1 hour of music, composed by Robin Birner and Yannick Süß from Audinity.
data.about_the_game: The atmospheric Soundtrack to The Guild 3 features 25 high quality tracks for a total of nearly 1 hour of music, composed by Robin Birner and Yannick Süß from Audinity.
data.short_description: The atmospheric Soundtrack to The Guild 3 features 25 high quality tracks for a total of nearly 1 hour of music, composed by Robin Birner and Yannick Süß from Audinity.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 132 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 585 MB available space
